name: @grndwork/api-client
description: API client for GroundWork Renewables Inc

scripts.update: npm run update:node && npm run update:python
scripts.update:node: updates --update --minor --exclude && (git diff-files --quiet package.json || (rimraf package-lock.json node_modules && npm install))
scripts.postupdate: git diff-files --quiet package-lock.json Pipfile.lock || (npm test && npm run build)
scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:py
scripts.pretest: eslint ./ && pipenv run flake8 && pipenv run mypy src_py/grndwork_api_client
scripts.test: npm run test:jest && npm run test:pytest
scripts.test:watch: nodemon -w ./ -e ts,py -x 'npm run pretest && npm run test:jest -- --notify --reporters=jest-simple-dot-reporter && npm run test:pytest'
scripts.publish:py: pipenv run python3 -m twine upload dist_py/*
